haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Obltn Oswald Fromm
Ltn Augustus Kass
Fw Detlef Schwarzer

 The mission was flown from Balatre,E Roye aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 05/09/1916 near Sampigny.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.124 Lafayette was brought down by Gebhard Zinn of Jasta 16b.
Sergt Geraud Carre was killed in action.
Gebhard Zinn was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/09/1916 near Villers-Saint-Cristophe.
A F.E.2b of Esc 66 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Ulysse Duvallet was killed in action.
Xavier Viala was made a prisoner of war.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/09/1916 near Lachalade.
A F.E.2b of Esc 13 was brought down by Urs Kehlmann of Jasta 16b.
Cpl Mattieu Vidal was killed in action.
S/Lt Victor Daucourt was killed in action.
Urs Kehlmann was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.
narrative:
I bring down a French pusher, seemingly my favorite victim.  His partner, however, holes my engine.  In a spew of oil it quits.  My forced landing is not graceful as I flip my aircraft, however, I walk away unhurt.

First to twenty victories!
